name: PATTS COLLEGE OF AERONAUTICS, INC.
about: PATTS College of Aeronautics, founded in 1969 as the Philippine Air Transport and Training Services, is a premier aeronautical institution in the Philippines. Established by Filipino and American pioneers in aviation, the school initially aimed to provide professional and technical training with courses in airframe mechanics, power plant mechanics, and avionics. It later added a four-year Aeronautical Engineering program. Known for its excellence, PATTS College of Aeronautics has consistently produced top performers in the PRC’s Licensure Board Examination for Aeronautical Engineers since 1983. In 1989, it attained college status and relocated to its current campus at Lombos Avenue, San Isidro, Parañaque City in 2005. The college offers a range of aviation and non-aviation programs, including on-the-job training with major aviation companies, and is committed to providing quality and affordable education to shape the future of aviation.
services:
["Aircraft Design Engineer
Aircraft Structural and Power Plant Engineer
Aircraft Operation / Performance Engineer
Research and Development Engineer
Aeronautical Engineering Consultant"]
